h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Lower Pagoda (Level 1)

The interior tunnel will end with a sealed cell gate, as well as a Starved Abomination that will try to ambush you from a corner. Let the creature tire itself out swinging wildly with its sickle before taking it down with just a few hits.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, ominous scene within the "Lower Pagoda (Level 1)" section of *The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm*. A character, armed with a staff-like weapon, stands near a sealed cell gate in a rocky, dimly lit environment. The gate features intricate designs, and a creature appears suspended above it, adding to the foreboding atmosphere. The visual aligns with the preceding text, which describes an encounter with a Starved Abomination near a sealed gate, suggesting the image illustrates this moment in the narrative.
